description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Dragon Chess is a variant of traditional chess with an expanded board size, flanks, two more Pawns and introduces the exciting new Dragon piece. The Dragon piece can move three spaces in any direction. 2-Games-In-1, standard chess and dragon chess, with stylized chess pieces and a medieval castle, Dragon Chess is the only chess game you need on the Xbox 360. www.dragonchess.net
